vote.text: Amendment SA 1248 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1248 proposed by Senator Merkley. (consideration: CR S6661; text: CR S6661) To provide a one-year sunset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1248 proposed by Senator Merkley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1248 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
